text: "Little Red Corvette" is a pop/rock song by musician Prince. The song was his biggest hit at the time of release. It got to #6 on the Billboard Hot 100. The song was on the Prince album 1999. In this song, the LinnDrum was heard. The song was released on February 9, 1983. Category:1983 songs Category:Prince (musician) songs Category:Songs about sexuality
title: Little Red Corvette
